# Tree

The goal of Tree is to draw a christmas tree

## Example

```{r example}
christ_tree(bg = 'gold3',  # color of canvas
            mcol = 'black', # color of title "Merry Christmas"
            tcol = 'darkseagreen4') # color of "for you"
```
